listener.description: Look for keys on page and replace when necessary

option.default_value: {title}%0D%0A%0D%0AGo check it out with this link: {url}
I thought you might like this!

option.edit_format_params: facebook=Facebook twitter=Twitter (OpenShareCount - read description) googleplus=Google+ linkedin=LinkedIn pinterest=Pinterest vk=ВКонтакте (VK)
option.sub_options: facebook twitter googleplus linkedin pinterest vk

option.edit_format_params: facebook=Facebook twitter=Twitter googleplus=Google+ linkedin=LinkedIn stumbleupon=StumbleUpon pinterest=Pinterest delicious=Delicious tumblr=Tumblr reddit=Reddit vk=ВКонтакте (VK) whatsapp=WhatsApp line=LINE (read description) blogger=Blogger livejournal=LiveJournal wordpress=WordPress yahoo=Yahoo skype=Skype telegram=Telegram.me digg=Digg getpocket=GetPocket xing=Xing email=E-Mail
option.sub_options: facebook twitter googleplus linkedin stumbleupon pinterest delicious tumblr reddit vk whatsapp line blogger livejournal wordpress yahoo skype telegram digg getpocket xing email

phrases.phrase: Allow user to disable display from Preferences
Enabling this option will add another entry for the "Social Share display" option in Preferences for user to disable the display.

Enabling this option will force the add-on to output cache hit status to Server Error Log. You may want to enable this for the first few minutes prior to installing the add-on to see if the cache is being used correctly.
You may customize the prefix of the cache ID with this option. Please keep in mind that you may only enter valid strings. By changing the prefix, the add-on will be forced to ignore old caches.

Set how long to cache share counts of every pages (in seconds). To disable caching, use 0.
NOTE: This requires your XenForo installation to have any back-end caching enabled!

By enabling this option, the add-on will use compressed version of the JavaScript file (recommended in production forums). This option was simply added to make it easier to switch versions during development.
cURL Option: Use the add-on's certificate bundle

You may manually update the cacert.pem file located in library/EndlessHorizon/SocialShare/cacert.pem with this file whenever you feel like to.
NOTICE: If you've had included a certificate info in your php.ini file, it's better to disable this option to avoid conflicts.

Enable this option to tell cURL to check the existence of common name and verify that it matches the hostname provided.
Note: For cURL version 7.10 or newer, this option will also tell cURL to verify peer's certificate.

If you don't want to use cURL for whatever reason, then disable it here. Afterwards, the add-on will use file_get_contents function instead. If you want to disable all share counts, you have to disable all sites from the Enable share counts option above.
Note: If you don't have cURL, the add-on will still automatically use file_get_contents function.

Set your preferred body for the email share here.
You may also use these params: {url} for the page's URL and {title} for the page's title.
Hint: If you want to add new lines, write %0D%0A at the end of every line which will have a new line after them.

Set your preferred subject for the email share here.
You may also use these params: {url} for the page's URL and {title} for the page's title.

If you haven't added Font Awesome by your own, you can use this add-on to add it (don't forget to fill Font Awesome CSS path option below). Please note, this add-on will add it to all pages served by your XenForo installation.

Enabling this option will make the add-on output debug messages when fetching share count from any social sites into your Server Error Logs. If some social sites have never returned share count to your server, you may want to know why by enabling this option.
Path to the main CSS of Font Awesome. This can be a relative or a fixed path.
Enabling this option will make the add-on output debug messages into your and your visitor's browser console.

A fixed path to a JPG, PNG or GIF image that will be used as pin for Pinterest share.
Leaving this option blank will tell the add-on to use the image you specified for Open Graph whenever available (the add-on will only use the first found Open Graph image).
NOTICE: Do not use a relative path! Pinterest will try to fetch the image remotely, so it will need direct access to the image. Thus it will also fail if you have an anti image hotlinking service enabled.

(Optional) Choose sites which you want their share counts to be fetched by the add-on. Please note that even if you have a site disabled in the Enable social sites option, the add-on will still fetch its share count as long as you have it enabled in this option, so if you want to disable a site, make sure you disable the share count as well.
If you want to use Twitter, you must register your forums at OpenShareCount.
This add-on will not fetch share counts for individual post.
WARNING: Strongly suggested not to enable this feature if your XenForo installation doesn't have any back-end caching enabled, otherwise there'll be a considerable performance impact because your server will have to fetch share counts on EVERY page load.

Choose social sites that you want to enable. Disabling all sites will prevent any necessary JavaScript files to be loaded.
If you want to use LINE, please be aware that the add-on will use an image instead of a Font Awesome icon.
You can customize some of the styling from the Style Properties page.

Set how long will the add-on let cURL or file_get_contents run in every tries to fetch share count from social sites (in milliseconds). This strongly depends on your server's latency to the social sites' servers. Servers with lower latency may have this lower, while servers with higher latency must have this higher.
To disable timeout limit, set this option to 0 (not recommended in production forums).
If your cURL version is older than version 7.6.12, the add-on will automatically convert the timeout value into seconds, and round the fractions up with ceil function.
Try again if the previous attempt failed
If the add-on couldn't fetch any share count from ANY social sites in the previous attempt, tell the add-on to try again in the next attempt (next page load).
(Optional) A comma-separated list of accounts related to the content of the shared URI.
(Optional) Attribute the source of a Tweet to a Twitter username.

Enabling this option will display a floating share button.
When this option is enabled, all the options below will be disabled (except View on threads > Post's Permalink).

Select where you want the Share This Page widget to show on pages. The default is on the bottom, but it may not display correctly without extra styling (should only need a little margin). Which is why for this add-on only, the default is on the top. So if you want to enable it on the bottom, you may need to do some styling tweaks to make sure it display correctly.
Select where you want the Share This Page widget to show on threads list. The default is not to show any.

Select where you want the Share This Page widget to show on threads. The default is on the bottom, but you can also have it enabled on the top, above the quick reply and/or within post's permalink.
Notes: Enabling it within post's permalink will add a "Share This Post" button instead. All of the buttons will then automatically use the post's permalink instead of the thread's. Also, share counts will be hidden if the overlay display was triggered from post's permalink, since the share counts represent the whole thread instead of individual post.

By enabling this option, whenever the add-on can't fetch share count from a particular social site, it will fallback to zero instead of not displaying any count.
Note: This will NOT make Try again if the previous attempt failed option obsolete.

Originally, Facebook SDK would be enabled when you chose to enable Facebook Like / Recommended Feature in Search Engine Optimization (SEO) options, but since Facebook SDK is not required by this add-on, it's being forcibly disabled. If you need Facebook SDK for anything else, such as Facebook Comments plugin, you will have to enable it through this option.

Floating social share widget.
Made with love by Bobby Wibowo.
Enable animation for Floating Share Button
Disabling this option will prevent the floating share button from displaying on devices with screen size matching @maxResponsiveNarrowWidth.
Display floating share button on mobile
.ehss_overlay .ehss_items .ehss_inner ul li a span .fa, .ehss_overlay .ehss_items .ehss_inner ul li a span .ehss
Floating social share widget. Made with love by Bobby Wibowo.

Choose how you want the Social Share button to display. Default option will make the Social Share button use the default display mode that the site's administrator chose. Some area may be disabled for "Sidebar and/or page's top and bottom area" option.
Sidebar and/or page's top and bottom area

property.title: Overlay Item's Icon
property.description: .ehss_overlay .ehss_items .ehss_inner ul li a span .fa, .ehss_overlay .ehss_items .ehss_inner ul li a span .ehss

property.title: Enable animation for Floating Share Button
Display floating share button on mobile
property.description: Disabling this option will prevent the floating share button from displaying on devices with screen size matching @maxResponsiveNarrowWidth.

group.title: [Endless Horizon] Social Share
group.description: Floating social share widget. Made with love by Bobby Wibowo.

templates.template: {xen:phrase view_EHSS_account_preferences_option_explanation}

<xen:if is="in_array(true, {$xenOptions.EHSS_ShareCounter})">
    <xen:set var="$EHSS_counts"><xen:callback class="EndlessHorizon_SocialShare_Listener2" method="getShareCounts"></xen:callback></xen:set>
</xen:if>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var EHSS_settings =
        {
            "url"     : '{$requestPaths.fullUri}',
            "count-p" : '{xen:phrase view_EHSS_count_title_plural}',
            "count-s" : '{xen:phrase view_EHSS_count_title_singular}',
            "counts"  : '{$EHSS_counts}',
            "debug"   : {$xenOptions.EHSS_JSDebug},
			"fsbanim" : {xen:property EHSS_fsbanim}
        },
        <xen:comment>
        /* To read more about the parameters of windows.open(), please read this: http://docs.webplatform.org/wiki/dom/Window/open
         *
         * Legend:
         * ic   = Icon's Class Name
         * bg   = Icon's Background Color
         * url  = Popup URL
         * dim  = Popup's Dimension (width * height)
         * scid = Share Count's ID
         * pin  = (Key) Pinterest
         * pb   = Blank Popup (open popup in a new tab)
         */
        </xen:comment>
        EHSS_sites = {<xen:if is="{$xenOptions.EHSS_SocialSites.facebook}">
            "Facebook": {
                ic:   "{xen:property EHSS_facebook_ic}",
                bg:   "{xen:property EHSS_facebook_bg}",
                url:  "https://www.facebook.com/sharer/sharer.php?u={url}&t={title}",
                dim:  { w: 900, h: 500 },
                scid: "facebook"
            },</xen:if><xen:if is="{$xenOptions.EHSS_SocialSites.twitter}">
            "Twitter": {
                ic:   "{xen:property EHSS_twitter_ic}",
                bg:   "{xen:property EHSS_twitter_bg}",
                url:  "https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?text={title}&url={url}{xen:if '{$xenOptions.EHSS_TweetParamVia}', '&via={$xenOptions.EHSS_TweetParamVia}'}{xen:if '{$xenOptions.EHSS_TweetParamRelated}', '&related={$xenOptions.EHSS_TweetParamRelated}'}",
                dim:  { w: 650, h: 360 },
                scid: "twitter"
            },</xen:if><xen:if is="{$xenOptions.EHSS_SocialSites.googleplus}">
            "Google+": {
                ic:   "{xen:property EHSS_googleplus_ic}",
                bg:   "{xen:property EHSS_googleplus_bg}",
                url:  "https://plus.google.com/share?url={url}",
                dim:  { w: 600, h: 460 },
                scid: "googleplus"
            },</xen:if><xen:if is="{$xenOptions.EHSS_SocialSites.linkedin}">
            "LinkedIn": {
                ic:   "{xen:property EHSS_linkedin_ic}",
                bg:   "{xen:property EHSS_linkedin_bg}",
                url:  "https://www.linkedin.com/cws/share?url={url}&token=&isFramed=true",
                dim:  { w: 550, h: 550 },
                scid: "linkedin"
            },</xen:if><xen:if is="{$xenOptions.EHSS_SocialSites.stumbleupon}">
            "StumbleUpon": {
                ic:   "{xen:property EHSS_stumbleupon_ic}",
                bg:   "{xen:property EHSS_stumbleupon_bg}",
                url:  "https://www.stumbleupon.com/badge/?url={url}",
                dim:  { w: 550, h: 550 }
            },</xen:if><xen:if is="{$xenOptions.EHSS_SocialSites.pinterest}">
            "Pinterest": {
                ic:   "{xen:property EHSS_pinterest_ic}",
                bg:   "{xen:property EHSS_pinterest_bg}",
                url:  "https://pinterest.com/pin/create/button/?url={url}&description={title}{xen:if '{$xenOptions.EHSS_PinterestMedia}', '&media={$xenOptions.EHSS_PinterestMedia}'}",
                dim:  { w: 700, h: 610 },
                scid: "pinterest",
                pin:  1
            },</xen:if><xen:if is="{$xenOptions.EHSS_SocialSites.delicious}">
            "Delicious": {
                ic:   "{xen:property EHSS_delicious_ic}",
                bg:   "{xen:property EHSS_delicious_bg}",
                url:  "https://del.icio.us/save?v=5&noui&jump=close&url={url}&title={title}",
                dim:  { w: 550, h: 550 }
            },</xen:if><xen:if is="{$xenOptions.EHSS_SocialSites.tumblr}">
            "Tumblr": {
                ic:   "{xen:property EHSS_tumblr_ic}",
                bg:   "{xen:property EHSS_tumblr_bg}",
                url:  "https://www.tumblr.com/share/link?url={url}&name={title}",
                dim:  { w: 550, h: 550 }
            },</xen:if><xen:if is="{$xenOptions.EHSS_SocialSites.reddit}">
            "Reddit": {
                ic:   "{xen:property EHSS_reddit_ic}",
                bg:   "{xen:property EHSS_reddit_bg}",
                url:  "https://www.reddit.com/submit?url={url}&title={title}",
                dim:  { w: 550, h: 550 }
            },</xen:if><xen:if is="{$xenOptions.EHSS_SocialSites.vk}">
            "ВКонтакте (VK)": {
                ic:   "{xen:property EHSS_vk_ic}",
                bg:   "{xen:property EHSS_vk_bg}",
                url:  "http://vk.com/share.php?url={url}",
                dim:  { w: 550, h: 550 },
                scid: "vk"
            },</xen:if><xen:if is="{$xenOptions.EHSS_SocialSites.whatsapp}">
            "WhatsApp": {
                ic:   "{xen:property EHSS_whatsapp_ic}",
                bg:   "{xen:property EHSS_whatsapp_bg}",
                url:  "whatsapp://send?text={title}%20{url}",
                pb:   1
            },</xen:if><xen:if is="{$xenOptions.EHSS_SocialSites.line}">
            "LINE": {
                ic:   "{xen:property EHSS_line_ic}",
                bg:   "{xen:property EHSS_line_bg}",
                url:  "http://line.me/R/msg/text/{title}%20{url}",
                pb:   1
            },</xen:if><xen:if is="{$xenOptions.EHSS_SocialSites.blogger}">
            "Blogger": {
                ic:   "{xen:property EHSS_blogger_ic}",
                bg:   "{xen:property EHSS_blogger_bg}",
                url:  "https://www.blogger.com/blog-this.g?u={url}&n={title}&t={desc}",
                dim:  { w: 550, h: 550 }
            },</xen:if><xen:if is="{$xenOptions.EHSS_SocialSites.livejournal}">
            "LiveJournal": {
                ic:   "{xen:property EHSS_livejournal_ic}",
                bg:   "{xen:property EHSS_livejournal_bg}",
                url:  "http://www.livejournal.com/update.bml?subject={title}&event={url}",
                dim:  { w: 550, h: 550 }
            },</xen:if><xen:if is="{$xenOptions.EHSS_SocialSites.wordpress}">
            "WordPress": {
                ic:   "{xen:property EHSS_wordpress_ic}",
                bg:   "{xen:property EHSS_wordpress_bg}",
                url:  "http://wordpress.com/press-this.php?u=[post-url]&t=[post-title]&s=[post-desc]&i=[post-img]",
                dim:  { w: 550, h: 550 }
            },</xen:if><xen:if is="{$xenOptions.EHSS_SocialSites.yahoo}">
            "Yahoo": {
                ic:   "{xen:property EHSS_yahoo_ic}",
                bg:   "{xen:property EHSS_yahoo_bg}",
                url:  "http://compose.mail.yahoo.com/?body={url}",
                dim:  { w: 550, h: 550 }
            },</xen:if><xen:if is="{$xenOptions.EHSS_SocialSites.skype}">
            "Skype": {
                ic:   "{xen:property EHSS_skype_ic}",
                bg:   "{xen:property EHSS_skype_bg}",
                url:  "https://web.skype.com/share?url={url}",
                dim:  { w: 550, h: 550 }
            },</xen:if><xen:if is="{$xenOptions.EHSS_SocialSites.telegram}">
            "Telegram.me": {
                ic:   "{xen:property EHSS_telegram_ic}",
                bg:   "{xen:property EHSS_telegram_bg}",
                url:  "https://telegram.me/share/url?url={url}&text={title}",
                dim:  { w: 550, h: 550 }
            },</xen:if><xen:if is="{$xenOptions.EHSS_SocialSites.digg}">
            "Digg": {
                ic:   "{xen:property EHSS_digg_ic}",
                bg:   "{xen:property EHSS_digg_bg}",
                url:  "http://digg.com/submit?url={url}&title={title}",
                dim:  { w: 550, h: 550 }
            },</xen:if><xen:if is="{$xenOptions.EHSS_SocialSites.getpocket}">
            "GetPocket": {
                ic:   "{xen:property EHSS_getpocket_ic}",
                bg:   "{xen:property EHSS_getpocket_bg}",
                url:  "https://getpocket.com/save?url={url}",
                dim:  { w: 550, h: 550 }
            },</xen:if><xen:if is="{$xenOptions.EHSS_SocialSites.xing}">
            "Xing": {
                ic:   "{xen:property EHSS_xing_ic}",
                bg:   "{xen:property EHSS_xing_bg}",
                url:  "https://www.xing.com/app/user?op=share&url={url}",
                dim:  { w: 550, h: 550 }
            },</xen:if><xen:if is="{$xenOptions.EHSS_SocialSites.email}">
            "Email": {
                ic:   "{xen:property EHSS_email_ic}",
                bg:   "{xen:property EHSS_email_bg}",
                url:  "mailto:?{xen:if '{$xenOptions.EHSS_EmailSubject}', 'subject={$xenOptions.EHSS_EmailSubject}&'}{xen:if '{$xenOptions.EHSS_EmailBody}', 'body={$xenOptions.EHSS_EmailBody}'}",
                pb:   1
            },</xen:if>
        };
</script>

modification.description: Hook to PAGE_CONTAINER template (adds ability to add Font Awesome)
Hook to PAGE_CONTAINER template (adds ability to show floating share button)
Hook to account_preferences (add preferences option to choose display mode)
Append comment to tell add-on callback that the widget is being used
Append comment to tell add-on callback that the widget is being used
Hook to forum_view template (adds ability to show widget on top of threads list)
Hook to forum_view template (adds ability to show widget under threads list)
Hook to page_container_js_body template (adds ability to forcibly enable Facebook SDK)
Append comment to tell add-on where to include eh_socialshare_js template
Hook to pagenode_container template (adds ability to show widget on top of pages)
Hook to pagenode_container template (adds ability to disable default widget on bottom of pages)
Hook to addthis_ajax template (adds ability to show widget on post's permalink)
modification.replace:
{xen:link full:threads/post-permalink, $thread, 'post={$post}'}
$0

modification.description: Hook to quick_reply template (adds ability to show widget besides quick reply controls)
Replace share_page template completely (share page widget on threads and pages)
Replace sidebar_share_page template completely (share page widget on sidebar)
Hook to thread_view template (adds ability to show widget on top of threads)
Hook to thread_view template (adds ability to disable default widget on bottom of threads)
Hook to thread_view template (adds ability to show widget above quick reply)
